text: Usaka caukidaraharu mancheko agadiâ€“pachadi niyukta chan, jo allahako hukuma anusara tyasako caukasi gardachan. Kunai samudayako avastha allaha badaldaina jabasam'ma ki tyasale svayam usala'i na badalos jo usaka hrdayama chan, ra allaha jaba kunai samudayala'i dandita garne yojana bana'umcha, ta tyo parivartana humdaina. Ra usabaheka kohi pani usako yojanakara chaina
